content.question: Part C The function <math alttext="m"> <mi>m</mi> </math> is given by <math alttext="m open parentheses x close parentheses equals 2 cos squared x minus cos x"><mi>m</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>cos</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi></math>. Find all values in the domain of <math alttext="m"><mi>m</mi></math> that yield an output value of <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
